## runpod remove pods

remove all pods using name

### Synopsis

remove all pods using name from runpod.io

```
runpod remove pods [name] [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for pods
      --podCount int   number of pods to remove with the same name (default 1)
```
